name: Sky Tower (itch)
description:
Reminder, follow 8080 for notifications on updates ! Let's keep Amiga alive and prosper! Most important is to have fun!

Your payment/tip is a contribution for my Amiga projects ;)

v0.38 small bug patched ! ;)

Sky Tower

(Source code AmiBlitz3 included, why not modify it to your own game)

Build to the skies!!!

     

Keys: SPACE - drop, M - music, F - FPS counter, Esc - Exit   

req: AmigaOS3.x, AHI, 640x360 RTG 16-bit, 68020+ minimum 100MIPS, 8MB RAM

As usual don't expect a AAA game, it's done in AmiBlitz3
